NbuildAppList.Name: Docker
NbuildAppList.UninstallArgs: -Command "& {Start-Process -FilePath '$(InstallPath)\Docker Desktop Installer.exe' -ArgumentList 'uninstall --quiet' -NoNewWindow -Wait; while ((Get-Process 'Docker Desktop Installer' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue) -or (Get-Process 'Docker' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue)) { Start-Sleep -Seconds 5 }}"
